atk1-text: Roll Venom + TR vs. STR + SR against an adjacent insect. The target gains Wounds and Infected for each net success.
atk2-text: Move in a line of hexes up to your SPE. Roll Carapace + STR. Each insect in that line must roll STR + SR to resist. Each insect you succeed against gains wounds for each success and is pushed that many hexes in a direction you choose.
atk3-text: Roll PAS + TR + Current Wounds vs. STR + SR against an adjacent insect. The target gains wounds for each net success. On a success, advance self one.
atk4-text: Roll STR + TR vs. STR + SR against an adjacent insect. The target gains wounds and is pushed 1 for each net success. If the insect collides with another insect, both take 1 wound.
